text: Kyndryl is the world's largest
IT infrastructure services provider.

We are joining forces with
AWS to help our clients

through their cloud
transformational journey.
Our people, their skills,
are our primary asset and differentiator.
So therefore, keeping that training and
certification current is critical to our business.
We are a premier tier AWS partner
with over 10,200 certifications
and over 6,000 accreditations.
We recognize that not everyone learns the same,

so therefore the curated plans we build with
our Partner Enablement Managers
are really multimodal.
A combination of instructor-led training,
both in classroom and virtual,

as well as self-paced learning,
allowing our employees
to learn at the rate and pace
and that works most effectively for them
and their learning styles.

Cloud Quest and Jam
Sessions become a great way

to actually practice in a
gamified or fun environment.
Skill Builder has become an integral part

of our pro and specialty
certifications in particular.
We see use of Skill Builder
to not only prepare for certifications
but to practice their skills.

We see a growth in our public
cloud signings,

which we think simply could not
have been accomplished

without the effort and focus
on our skills.
